definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Here's my prescription. Please take it to the pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 這是我開的處方，拿它到藥房取藥。

sentences.english: The pharmacy, laboratory and office area occupy the east wing.
sentences.chinese: 藥房，實驗室和辦公區在東翼。

sentences.english: You may apply for VIP card for free.
sentences.chinese: 您可以申請國大藥房會員卡，會員卡是免費的。

sentences.english: The third spot was a Chinese pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 第三個景點是一家中藥房。

sentences.english: With the doctor' s prescription, I came to the pharmacy to get the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 拿着大夫的處方，我來到藥房取藥。

sentences.english: There are a lot of high end companies that put out drugstore brands with one example being Lancome .
sentences.chinese: 有很多高端的公司推出的藥房品牌的一個例子是蘭蔻。

sentences.english: If somebody really needed it, that pharmacy won't be able to help now.
sentences.chinese: 如果現在有人真的需要，藥房已經不能幫助他們了。

sentences.english: Objective To supply reference for improving managing status of retail pharmacies in Dali.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲大理市改善零售藥房的經營狀況提供參考。

sentences.english: MethodsAnalyzing actuality of retail pharmacies in Dali.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析大理市零售藥房現狀。

sentences.english: Please go to emergency pharmacy for your medicines.
And if it runs out I can stop at a drug-store.
sentences.chinese: 如果用光了，我可以找一個藥房停下來。

sentences.english: Drugstores, or pharmacies, sell cosmetics and toiletries as well as many other products.
sentences.chinese: 藥房或藥店還出售化妝品，梳洗用品及其它許多商品。

sentences.english: But it’s also had the unintended effect of driving rural pharmacies out of business.
sentences.chinese: 但也意外地攪了鄉村藥房的生意。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the pharmacy trusteeship's impact on health services to the community.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了解藥房託管對社區衛生服務利用的影響。

sentences.english: But the rate of pharmacy errors is much higher than people think.
sentences.chinese: 然而，藥房的出錯率比人們所想的要高得多。

sentences.english: With the doctor' s prescription, I came to the pharmacy22 to get the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 拿着大夫的處方，我來到藥房取藥。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
